item.rel_title: Estimating the infection and case fatality ratio for COVID-19 using age-adjusted data from the outbreak on the Diamond Princess cruise ship
item.rel_abs: Adjusting for delay from confirmation-to-death, we estimated case and infection fatality ratios (CFR, IFR) for COVID-19 on the Diamond Princess ship as 1.2% (0.38-2.7%) and 2.3% (0.75%-5.3%). Comparing deaths onboard with expected deaths based on naive CFR estimates using China data, we estimate IFR and CFR in China to be 0.5% (95% CI: 0.2-1.2%) and 1.1% (95% CI: 0.3-2.4%) respectively.
item.rel_authors: Russell, T. W.; Hellewell, J.; Jarvis, C. I.; van-Zandvoort, K.; Abbott, S.; Ratnayake, R.; CMMID nCov working group, ; Flasche, S.; Eggo, R. M.; Kucharski, A. J.
